title: I have a two part question. Is the new Wal-Mart being built in Burgaw a super Wal-Mart or a regular one? Also I had heard  that a Bojangles was being built in Burgaw too. Is that true? Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/04/is-the-new-walmart-being-built-in-burgaw-a-supercenter-store/
